title: NO FEE 1 bed 1.5 Bath W/Balcony & Washer Dryer- Luxury Building
posting_body: ['Live the ultimate NYC dream in one of the most glamorous buildings – the Mondrian!', 'his spacious sun-soaked apartment has floor-to-ceiling windows and a private balcony with phenomenal views of the city!', 'SIXTEENTH FLOOR!!', 'Recently upgraded kitchen has brand new Bosch appliances, and a washer/dryer!', 'The enormous en-suite bathroom that features both a separate steam shower and a soaking tub is complimented by a marble half-bath next to the living room.', 'The large bedroom boasts custom closets and will easily accommodate a king-sized bed.', 'Custom closets installed Nov. 2020.', 'The Mondrian is a full-serviced building that has a spectacular terrace overlooking the city, an easy access to Equinox Fitness Center, and is only steps away to transportation, restaurants, and grocery stores; with Central Park a convenient 15-minute walk away.', 'UNBELIEVABLE DEAL - WONT LAST!!!', '(Must have good credit and references)', '* Cats and Dogs Allowed', '* Dishwasher', '* Elevator', '* Full-time Doorman', '* Washer / Dryer in Unit', '* Private Outdoor Space', '* Recently upgraded kitchen has brand new Bosch appliances', '* Marble En-suite bathroom & Half bath', '* Bedroom Accommodate a king-sized bed.', '* Custom closets']
